parameters.definition: Units of anti-oxidants in a pack of blueberries
Units of minerals in a pack of blueberries
Units of anti-oxidants in a pack of strawberries
Units of minerals in a pack of strawberries
Ratio of packs of strawberries to blueberries
Grams of sugar in a pack of blueberries
Grams of sugar in a pack of strawberries

description: A dietician recommends her client eat blueberries and strawberries to meet her anti-oxidant and mineral requirement. A pack of blueberries contains \param{BlueberryAntioxidants} units of anti-oxidants and \param{BlueberryMinerals} units of minerals. A pack of strawberries contains \param{StrawberryAntioxidants} unit of anti-oxidants and \param{StrawberryMinerals} units of minerals. The client must get at least \param{MinAntioxidants} units of anti-oxidants and \param{MinMinerals} units of minerals. In addition, because blueberries are not in season, the dietician recommends she eats at least 3 times as many packs of strawberries as blueberries. This is expressed as a strawberry to blueberry ratio of \param{StrawberryBlueberryRatio}. If a pack of blueberries contains \param{BlueberrySugar} grams of sugar and a pack of strawberries contains \param{StrawberrySugar} grams of sugar, how many of packs of each should she consume to minimize her sugar intake?
